databaseConfig.sql: SELECT SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_GETSUJI_SHIME

WHERE SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU >= :START_DATE AND SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU <= :END_DATE
ORDER BY SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU

SELECT SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID

SELECT SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID = :SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID

SELECT SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.NEN_GETSU , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.MS_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.SEND_FLAG , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.VESSEL_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.DATA_NO , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.USER_KEY , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_DATE , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_GETSUJI_SHIME.TS FROM SI_GETSUJI_SHIME WHERE NEN_GETSU IN ( SELECT max(NEN_GETSU) FROM SI_GETSUJI_SHIME )

INSERT INTO SI_GETSUJI_SHIME ( SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , NEN_GETSU , MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID , :NEN_GETSU , :MS_USER_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_GETSUJI_SHIME SET NEN_GETSU =:NEN_GETSU , MS_USER_ID =:MS_USER_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID =:SI_GETSUJI_SHIME_ID AND TS = :TS
